Text: Language is not just a means of communication — it's a bridge to understanding culture, history, and identity. By speaking another language, we step into a different world.

In 2023, over 1.5 billion people were learning a new language. On average, it takes about 600 hours to become conversational in most European languages. Learning just 10 new words a day can lead to over 3,600 words in a year — enough to understand 80% of daily conversations.
